original_text: They shall not come near to me, to serve me as priest, nor come near any of my holy things and the things that are most holy, but they shall bear their shame and the abominations that they have committed.
korean_text: 그들이 내게 가까이 나아와 제사장의 직분을 행하지 못하며 또 내 성물 곧 지성물에 가까이 오지 못하리니 그들이 자기의 수치와 그 행한 바 가증한 일을 담당하리라

sentences.original_text: They shall not come near to me,
nor come near any of my holy things
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 거룩한 것들에도 가까이 오지 못하고

sentences.original_text: and the things that are most holy,
but they shall bear their shame
and the abominations that they have committed.
